Day 12 deliverable
========================================================
```{r}
# Testing human response times
getData <- function(N){
for(k in 1:N){
before <- Sys.time
readline("Press return:")
after <- Sys.time()
delay <- as.numeric(after-before)
cat(rep("\n",20))
result[k] <- delay
Sys.sleep(runif(1,min=1,max=5))}
return(result)}
```
